message: Let's split it equally, it's fair and square. Consider the impact of inflation on your share if you reject.
Considering inflation, meet me in the middle of my initial offer
Considering inflation, my previous fair offer and your last offer, this should be a better deal for you now.
Getting closer, don't want to lose more to inflation
Considering your share has dropped in value by 18.55% already. This offer is fair given the circumstances.
